Assisting and Leading weekly youth group functions and events. Guiding students through difficult life situations, listening to their concerns, and providing basic counsel through the direction given to us in the Bible.

I really enjoyed working with Colin at Canon and was very sad to see him go. Colin was able to work within my small budget and over-sized desires to find exactly the machine that I wanted and needed for our office. Because of his dedication to our needs, he won our business. I highly recommend Colin for any position that allows him to best serve a customer.
